DOC.brief_summary: The investigator recruit DoD beneficiary 18 year old , refer screen colonoscopy polyp surveillance ( one last 2 week ) , previous diagnosis colorectal cancer . They 25 OH Vitamin D level drawn determine association level obtain finding colonoscopy , previous finding ( repeat ) .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Screening Colonoscopy Polyp Surveillance
DOC.detailed_description: DoD beneficiary age 18 older recruit clinic Mike O'Callaghan Federal Medical Center ( MOFMC ) . Subjects meet inclusion/exclusion criterion offer opportunity participate : Screening Visit : - Obtain sign Informed Consent Document HIPAA Authorization ( research-driven ) . - Record : Date birth , age , gender , race , ethnicity , current email address , height ( inch ) , weight ( pound ) , waist circumference ( inch ) measurement , blood pressure , whether subject take take vitamin D supplement derivative , , note dosage , frequency , duration therapy . - Subjects tell fast least 10 hour prior Visit 1 Visit 1 ( within two week screen colonoscopy ) : -Subjects follow research-driven blood test drawn include : Serum 25-OH vitamin D via 1 venipuncture ( 5-10 ml , approximately 1-2 teaspoon blood drawn )
DOC.criteria: THIS STUDY IS BEING CONDUCTED AT A MILITARY INSTALLATION . YOU MUST HAVE MILITARY INSURANCE IN ORDER TO PARTICIPATE IN THIS STUDY . Inclusion : DoD beneficiaries 18 year old Referred screen colonoscopy polyp surveillance one last 2 week Exclusion : Previous diagnosis colorectal cancer , adenomatous polyp , and/or cancer Military trainee Pregnant woman
